changeLog: Added RelayChat API event to allow better compatibility with other mods modifying chat behaviour
Fixed duplicate Twitch connections resulting in duplicate chat messages
Fixed connection crash when sending messages without it being fully connected yet
Fixed connection crash on wrong password
